welcome_message_title: Welcome to Torrejon de la Calzada
welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Torrejon de la Calzada! This charming city is known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and experiencing all that it has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Barajas Airport, mainly used for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Barajas Airport, mainly used for domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Barajas Airport, mainly used for international and intercontinental flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4S
terminals.description: A satellite terminal connected to Terminal 4, mainly used for long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may require re-connection every 15 minutes.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrejon AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Torrejon AFB Airport, primarily used for military and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
